name: purity
explanation: The cleanliness of an object, material or person.
structure: Produces entries for different types of genres and worlds. The 'common' and 'rare' tables are generic and should be compatible with almost any world. To retain compatibility with most settings, the  non-generic tables should be called only from other tables by specifying their name directly.

tables.name: purity
tables.explanation: Cleanliness (in the physical or spiritual sense).

tables.name: common
tables.explanation: Common purity.

tables.name: rare
tables.explanation: Rare purity.

tables.name: impure
tables.explanation: Varieties of filthy.

tables.name: unclean
tables.explanation: Varieties of unclean.

tables.name: neutral
tables.explanation: Varieties of neutral.

tables.name: clean
tables.explanation: Varieties of clean.

tables.name: pure
tables.explanation: Varities of pure.

tables.name: myth
tables.explanation: Imaginary purity once rumoured to have existed.

tables.name: mythic impurity
tables.explanation: Imaginary impurity once rumoured to have existed.

tables.name: mythic purity
tables.explanation: Imaginary purity once rumoured to have existed.

tables.name: rare myth
tables.explanation: Rare imaginary purity once rumoured to have existed.

tables.name: fantasy
tables.explanation: Imaginary purity for fantasy (with no basis in myth).

tables.name: fantastic impurity
tables.explanation: Impurity for fantasy (with no basis in myth).

tables.name: fantastic purity
tables.explanation: Purity for fantasy (with no basis in myth).

tables.name: rare fantasy
tables.explanation: Rare purity for fantasy (with no basis in myth).

tables.name: modern
tables.explanation: Purity for modern worlds.

tables.name: modern impurity
tables.explanation: Modern impurity for modern worlds.

tables.name: modern purity
tables.explanation: Modern purity for modern worlds.

tables.name: rare modern
tables.explanation: Rare purity for modern worlds.

tables.name: futuristic
tables.explanation: Imaginary purity for science fiction worlds.

tables.name: futuristic impurity
tables.explanation: Imaginary impurity for science fiction worlds.

tables.name: futuristic purity
tables.explanation: Imaginary purity for science fiction worlds.

tables.name: rare futuristic
tables.explanation: Rare imaginary purity for science fiction worlds.
